products.name: Musselman's Unsweetened Apple Sauce
products.facts: ["Musselman's Unsweetened Apple Sauce is made from 100% pure apples, with no added sugars or artificial ingredients.","The apples used are sourced from U.S. orchards, supporting local agriculture and reducing transportation emissions.","Musselman's packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","The product is gluten-free and contains no preservatives, ensuring high quality and safety for consumers."]

products.name: 100 cocoa extra dark
products.facts: ["100% cocoa extra dark chocolate contains no added sugars or dairy, making it suitable for vegan diets.","The high cocoa content provides a rich source of antioxidants, which can support heart health.","Cocoa beans are often grown in shaded areas, promoting biodiversity and helping to preserve local ecosystems.","High-quality dark chocolate is typically made from single-origin cocoa beans, ensuring distinct flavor profiles and ethical sourcing."]

products.name: Le petit frais
products.facts: ["Le petit frais uses 100% organic cotton in its products.","The brand prioritizes sustainable sourcing of materials to minimize environmental impact.","All packaging is made from recycled materials to reduce waste.","Le petit frais ensures high-quality standards by adhering to strict certifications for eco-friendly practices."]

products.name: Danette chocolat
products.facts: ["Danette chocolat is packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","The product contains high-quality cocoa sourced from sustainable farms.","It is made with natural ingredients, ensuring a rich and authentic chocolate flavor.","Danette prioritizes eco-friendly production processes to minimize carbon footprint."]

products.name: Sirop d’agave
products.facts: ["Sirop dâagave is derived from the sap of the agave plant, primarily the blue agave species.","It is considered a sustainable sweetener as agave plants require less water than traditional crops like sugarcane.","Sirop dâagave has a lower glycemic index compared to regular sugar, making it a popular choice for those monitoring blood sugar levels.","The production of sirop dâagave can vary in quality; high-quality varieties are often organic and minimally processed."]

products.name: SKYR
products.facts: ["SKYR is made from high-quality Icelandic milk, known for its purity and nutritional value.","The production of SKYR involves a traditional straining process that removes whey, resulting in a thick and creamy texture.","SKYR is a sustainable dairy product, often produced using environmentally friendly practices in Iceland.","It is rich in protein and low in fat, making it a healthy choice for consumers seeking nutritious options."]

products.name: Yogurt
products.facts: ["Yogurt is made from milk that is fermented with specific bacterial cultures.","The production of yogurt can reduce food waste by utilizing milk that may otherwise spoil.","Many yogurts are packaged in recyclable containers, promoting eco-friendly practices.","High-quality yogurt contains live and active cultures, which are beneficial for gut health."]
